description: Dream Engine is a classic game emulator. It runs PC Engine/TurboGrafx-16 console games. With Dream Engine, you can play dozens of classic games that were available on the original console. Dream Engine comes with two sample games. More games (that are files with .pce extension) can be added to the application simply by placing them into dreamengine folder on the USB drive. Dream Engine has many features such as full screen game play, on screen game controls and state saving support.
